Creek Fried Potatoes

Ingredients

  • onion
  • potato
  • bacon
  • butter
  • salt & pepper

Instructions

  1. 425 for ~30 mins
  2. layer of onions
  3. layer of bacon
  4. layer of potato
  5. salt + pepper
  6. repeat
  7. add some butter
